title: An Inquiry into the growth of American cities

description: Episode of Series "Altered Environment Series". American cities have grown outwards, due to the appearance of unlimited land resources. Now questions are being asked about the environmental destruction resulting from urban sprawl. This film involves students in an analysis of the factors that must be considered in the design of cities
